examples.example: 妈妈今天用牛里脊做了一道美味又营养的菜肴。

translate.english: Mother made a delicious and nutritious dish with beef tenderloin today.

examples.example: 我用新鲜的牛里脊加上独特的调料，做出了让人赞不绝口的美味料理。

translate.english: I used fresh beef tenderloin and unique seasonings to make a delicious dish that people praise highly.

examples.example: 我精心挑选了一块牛里脊，准备为家人烹饪一顿丰盛的晚餐。

translate.english: I carefully selected a piece of beef tenderloin and prepared to cook a sumptuous dinner for my family.
